line_1: And hasty Strokes the quicker Pulse repeats.
line_2: Rooted we stand, the Heart incessant beats,

line_1: And at his club to wondering swains repeats;
line_2: High-sounding words our worthy Gardener gets,
Half yielding now he stands – Their houshold straits

line_1: His still refuted quirks he still repeats,
line_2: New rais'd objections with new quibbles meets,

line_1: "Fall gentle dews!" the fainting nymph repeats;
line_2: — With languid step fair DYPSACA retreats;

line_1: While he, with smiles, his happy chance repeats;
line_2: His eldest son the youthful stranger greets,

line_1: Or as the drum a certain sound repeats,
line_2: Flutters now low, and then in thunder beats;

line_1: Nor the pleas'd sense each flattering tale repeats,
line_2: Yet, when no more the pulse tumultuous beats,

line_1: And ev'ry Limb its former Task repeats.
line_2: The various Joynts resume their ancient Seats,
